alert.note: Alert for Beltrami; Clearwater; Pennington; Polk; Red Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 5:22PM CDT until August 01 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN RED LAKE...EAST CENTRAL POLK...CENTRAL BELTRAMI... SOUTHEASTERN PENNINGTON AND NORTHERN CLEARWATER COUNTIES... At 521 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Berner, or 34 miles southeast of Thief River Falls, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clearbrook, Gonvick, Gully, Trail, Berner, Debs and Olga. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Beltrami; Clearwater; Pennington; Polk; Red Lake
